Description: Allows for the easy randomization of only certain cosmetics through the favorite system, just right-click them in the Personalize page. Also allowing to only randomize the categories you want.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Randomize in-between games
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will randomize character and pet when the game finishes, they need to be indicated they have to be randomized.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Only the skins i want!
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will change to the first available favorited skin when your chosen skin gets taken in a lobby. Favorited skins are ordered by date of being chosen as a favorite.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Just randomize everything.
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will randomize every single cosmetic category. Not scrolls.

CheckboxSettings.Name: Do not use favorites
CheckboxSettings.Description: Will randomize without taking into account favorites. "Only the skins i want!" will take priority.
